verses.content: Varna chun a in chu a bâwl a, A lungban pasarihai chu a phun tah a.
A ranhai chu a that a, a uoin chu a chawkpawl tah a, A dawkân khawm chu a siemrêl ta bawk a.
A nunghâkhai chu a tir suok a, Khawpui hmun insângtakhaia chun an khêk a,
“Tukhawm mi mâwl chu hi tieng hin hung raw se,” tiin. Hrietthiemna boa um ta ding chun, a kuomah a hril a,
“Hung la, ka bei hung fa la, Ka uoin chawkpawl chu hung dâwn rawh.
Nang mi mâwl, mâwlna chu mâksanin khawsa la, Hrietthiemna lampui chu hung hraw rawh,” tiin.
Hmusittu siemṭhatu chun inzakna a hmu hlak a; Mi khawhlo kâwktu chun kut thlâkna a tuok hlak.
Hmusittu chu kâwk naw rawh, chuong naw chun, theida rawi a ti che. Mi var chu kâwk la, ama chun hmangai a ti che.
Mi var kuoma chun inchûktirna pe la, ama chu hung var nâwk sawt a ta, Mi fel chu inchûktir la, ama chu thiemnaa chun hung pung a tih.
LALPA ṭi chu varna bul a nih, Mi Inthieng hrietna chu hrietthiemna bul a ni bawk.
Keimaa chun i nihai chu belsa nîng a ta, I dam sûng kumhai chu sukpung nîng an tih.
I var chun, nangma ta dinga var i na, I hmusit chun, nangma ngeiin phur i tih.
Nuhmei invêt chu a hmûr a thiem a, Ama chu a mâwl a, iengkhawm a hriet nawh.
A in kawtkhâra chun a ṭhung a, Khawpui hmun insânghaia ṭhungnaa chun,
Mi fe inlawnhai ko dingin, Chuong an lampuia fe peihai chu,
“Tukhawm mi mâwl chu, hi tieng hung raw se,” tiin. Hrietthiemna boa um ta ding chun a hril a:
“Tui inrûkhai chu a thlum a, Fienriela bei fâk chu ân hnik bawk a,” tiin.
Amiruokchu, mithihai chu chutaka chun an um ti a hriet nawh a, Amanu mikhuolhai khawm chu Seol lipuia chun an um ti a hriet bawk nawh.
